learning.supervised.methods.discrete

Class KNNNB

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.supervised.DiscreteClassifier
      • learning.supervised.methods.discrete.KNNNB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Citable, java.io.Serializable, ValidateableInterface, AutomaticKFinderInterface

    public class KNNNB
extends DiscreteClassifier
implements AutomaticKFinderInterface, java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the k-nearest neighbor Naive Bayes algorithm, KNNNB, that learns a Naive Bayes model on the restriction of the data on the kNN set. Only the features from the k-neighbors are used when learning a probabilistic model.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
